articles.title: Mark Madden: Avalanche-Oilers matchup shows what hockey could be - TribLIVE
articles.description: Colorado beat Edmonton, 8-6, in the first game of the Western Conference final Tuesday. That game is how fans want hockey to be: 14 goals, 84 shots, fast, creative, fun, a ton of prime scoring chances and a fierce comeback by the Oilers that fell just short. …
